name: Surf 'N' Snow Backpackers
description:
Set in refurbished historic building just across Sky Tower- less than 50 meter walkway from Intercity/Sky Drive (Airport transfer). Surf ‘N’ Snow Backpackers offers budget accommodation in Auckland CBD (Central Business District). Guests enjoy UNLIMITED FREE ROOM WI-FI. All rooms are fitted with comfortable beds and include bed linen, pillows and a duvet.

Surf 'N' Snow Backpackers across Sky Tower offers a friendly environment, where guests can benefit from a fully-furnished shared kitchen. The hostel is situated in a central location, just moments away from shops, restaurants and bars. A travel desk is available to help further discover the area’s attractions, such as the Harbour Bridge and Eden Park .

Reception operation hours 07:00 am - 23:00 pm but if you are arriving late please send your passport copy with late arrival request via e-mail and we will arrange that accordingly for you- sweet as option! Early bag drop off and early morning express check out is possible – please ask one of our very friendly team member at front desk during the check in.

groupInformation.terms:
Any minors are required to be accompanied by adult. 
Minors are not allowed to stay in a dorm room by themselves.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms: Your credit card will be charged for the first night's stay when cancelled within 48 hours of arrival or in case or no show.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
We ask all guests to provide their IDs(ie.e Passports, Drivers License or HANZ 18+), upon check in. 

Key deposits of NZ$20 in cash are required per key.

houseRules.notes:
RECEPTION HOURS: 07:00 AM-23:00 PM!


It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.

Please inform Surf 'N' Snow Backpackers in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Guests are required to show a VALID PHYSCIAL PASSPORT and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

We are set in refurbished historic building just across from Sky Tower, Surf 'N' Snow Backpackers offers budget accommodation in Auckland CBD (Central Business District). We welcome late check in and early check out with advance notice. We have a common lounge with cable TV and a pool table. Guests enjoy FREE UNLIMITED ROOM WI-FI.

All rooms are fitted with comfortable beds and include bed linen, pillows and a duvet.

Surf 'N' Snow Backpackers offers a friendly environment, where guests can benefit from a semi-furnished shared kitchen. The hostel is situated in a central location, just moments away from shops, restaurants and bars. Reception desk is also available to help further discover the area's attractions, such as the Harbour Bridge and Eden Park.
